summary: Tailscale client metrics are now available for local or remote examination, and can be directly ingested by Prometheus or any compatible monitoring system. summary:
Not everything needs to be digital and ‚Äúsmart. ‚Äù License plates, for example:
Josep Rodriguez, a researcher at security firm IOActive, has revealed a technique to ‚Äújailbreak‚Äù digital license plates sold by Reviver, the leading vendor of those plates in the US with 65,000 plates already sold.  By removing a sticker on the back of the plate and attaching a cable to its internal connectors, he‚Äôs able to rewrite a Reviver plate‚Äôs firmware in a matter of minutes...
title: Hacking Digital License Plates
